name: The King of the Hill
description:
CONTROLS:

Movement: WSAD

Aim: Mouse

Shooting: LMB

DESCRIPTION:

You get extra points for shooting multiple enemies with one laser shot = (number of enemies eliminated) to the power of 2, eg. 5 enemies with one laser shot gives you 25 points.

Music: Celebration by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com) Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
